PackageOracle.name: DA_CHANNEL_ACCOUNT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CHANNEL_ACCOUNT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.44.500709000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,channel_account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_account_start_dt IN DATE
,channel_account_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,channel_account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_account_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_channel_account;

body.name: DA_CHANNEL_ACCOUNT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CHANNEL_ACCOUNT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.44.511044000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,channel_account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_account_start_dt IN DATE
,channel_account_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_channel_account.add, parms=' || channel_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || channel_account_role_cd || '|' || channel_account_start_dt || '|' || channel_account_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_channel_account a
(
a.channel_id
,a.account_id
,a.channel_account_role_cd
,a.channel_account_start_dt
,a.channel_account_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.channel_id
,add.account_id
,add.channel_account_role_cd
,add.channel_account_start_dt
,add.channel_account_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_channel_account.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,channel_account_role_cd IN VARCHAR2
,channel_account_start_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_channel_account.del, parms=' || channel_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || channel_account_role_cd || '|' || channel_account_start_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_channel_account a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.channel_id = del.channel_id
AND a.account_id = del.account_id
AND a.channel_account_role_cd = del.channel_account_role_cd
AND a.channel_account_start_dt = del.channel_account_start_dt
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_channel_account.del');

END del;

END da_channel_account;
